lead_paragraph: In comments that spawned outrage, the ambassador said that a Polish policy of blocking the formation of a coalition against Hitler’s Germany ultimately led to the invasions of Poland in 1939.

headline.main: Russian Ambassador Says Poland Was Partly to Blame for World War II
headline.print_headline: Russian Envoy Partly Blames Poland for World War II

snippet: In comments that spawned outrage, the ambassador said that a Polish policy of blocking the formation of a coalition against Hitler’s Germany ultimately led to the invasions of Poland in 1939.
